name: The Return of Lawn Mower
description:
The Return of Lawn Mower is an unofficial "sequel" to the NES homebrew game "Lawn Mower", created by Shiru.
This game was made to be entered into Mystery Tournament 6 on SpeedRunsLive.

The goal is to mow all the grass in each stage while avoiding the rocks and flowers. Some stages have special abilities you can use, and other surprises.
